name: Paulie Parrot
description:
Take to the skies as a Macaw Parrot named Paulie. This 'Tap-Tap' style game allows you to flap Paulie's wings with each tap of the screen. Be careful though- the jungle is full of dangerous obstacles! If Paulie hits one of these obstacles, your journey through the jungle will have to restart!

Compete with other's around the world by submitting your high score to the official 'Paulie Parrot Leader Board'. Let's see who can get the most Pauly Coins!
